definitions.definition: A lifting of the shoulders to signal indifference or a casual lack of knowledge.
examples: He dismissed my comment with a shrug .

definitions.definition: A cropped, cardigan -like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted .

main_definition: A lifting of the shoulders to signal indifference or a casual lack of knowledge.
secondary_definitions: A cropped, cardigan -like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted .
